title: codehtcmail
author: codehtcmail
content: All are talking about Metamask, I don't feel comfortable using it right nowHow to safely claim ETHW (ETHPOW) from MyCrypto ?

comments.author: zasad@
comments.body: If you don't feel comfortable with software wallets, then I recommend buying a Ledger, Trezor, or Safepal. With Ledger, Trezor you can work in metamask and MyCrypto as an interface.Or you create a new ethereum wallet and transfer all your assets to it. For ETHPOW, use a metamask.On the official site only this informationhttps://medium.com/@ETHW/tutorial-set-up-ethw-wallet-and-claim-airdrop-f72a3e7e090b

comments.author: vv181
comments.body: I believe you can try to just simply change the current network into ETHW, then you can have it.Just click "Change Network", then "Add Custom Node". There will be a pop-out to be filled, make sure you choose "Custom" on the "Network" dropdown.Based on the information at the referred link above, here is the network information:Network Name: ETHW-mainnetNew RPC URL: https://mainnet.ethereumpow.orgChain ID: 10001Currency Symbol: ETHWJust adjust accordingly with the form that MyCrypto has shown. After that, proceed with "Save & Use Custom Node".
